name: Hide and Spook
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity #36 - Mouse Jam 2, with the theme of 'Chase'
How does it fit the theme?
Upon finding you, the ghost does not lose aggro until the play hides, essentially chasing the player until they are out of reach.

In an attempt to escape from the pounding rain, you happen upon a house whose door opens of it's own accord to you. While taking shelter, you are chased by a ghost, and try to banish it by performing a ritual with 5 candles.

Known issues:
After a few seconds of playing, the screen flashes black, not sure why this happens, but it's a very minor issue. The player also tends to get stuck on walls, so please blame the collisions for any deaths near solid objects.

Controls:
Move - Click, Click and hold
Select - Click

(Everything is by me, apart from the audio, which is all free on the site freesound.org)
